short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill Lorem Ipsum into a page type "lorem#;"

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Help with filling Lorem Ipsum text.
Type anywhere to add Lorem Ipsum to a page.

lorem#; -> Will add Lorem Ipsum equal to number specified

lorem2; -> Hit Tab -> "Lorem Ipsum"

--------------------------------------

Make sure to press tab/space/enter after to confirm that you want to add the text to the page.
